name: MalaysiaPublicHolidays
0:
”Alexa, ask my public holidays when is the next public holiday.”
”Alexa, ask my public holidays when is the next public holiday in June.”
”Alexa, ask my public holidays tell me all holidays in May.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my public holidays
des: Malaysia Public Holidays let's you know upcoming holidays in Malaysia. This covers national and state holidays. For example, you can ask, "Alexa, ask my public holidays when is the next holiday", or "Alexa, ask my public holidays when is the next holiday in November". You can also ask, "Alexa, ask my public holidays list out all holidays in March".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
